author: gozer
msg: The push @Apache::TestMM::Argv trick comes back to allow Modperl-Registry
tests to pick up the statically build httpd (if static build)

author: gozer
msg: Using Apache::TestMM::Argv to propagate arguments to t/TEST was not
the ideal way, just make sure to set httpd in BuildConfig.pm instead

author: gozer
msg: When processing libs paths in httpd's source tree, we need to check
for .libs/ directory and add them to the -L path since the .so outside
of .dirs/ are libtools wrappers we cannot use.

author: gozer
msg: In the static build, run make in httpd's srclib/ early to have
generated files present at mod_perl configure time
